description: Partial sums of the partition numbers A000041.
comments: Equivalently, a(n) = number of sums S of positive integers satisfying S <= n.Equivalently, first differences give A000041. - _Jacques ALARDET_, Aug 04 2008, Aug 15 2008For the partial sums of the partitions numbers of nonnegative integers A001477 see A000070. - Omar E. Pol, Nov 12 2011Also number of parts in all regions of n that contain 1 as a part (Cf. A206437). - Omar E. Pol, Mar 11 2012
references: Thomas M. A. Fink, Emmanuel Barillot, and Sebastian E. Ahnert, Dynamics of network motifs, http://www.tcm.phy.cam.ac.uk/~tmf20/PUBLICATIONS/dynamics_motifs.pdf, 2006.
links: INRIA Algorithms Project, Encyclopedia of Combinatorial Structures 800
maple: a:=n->add(numbpart(k), k=1..n): seq(a(n), n=1..40); - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jun 01 2008
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 20 2015
